All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractMessage
Abstract message class.
AuthHandler
Authorization message listener class.
AuthHandler
Class listener of messages carrying information about the authorization request.
AuthMessage
The successor class AbstractMessage, is a Data Transfer Object, carrying the user's login and password to the server, and upon successful authorization contains contains a list of files in the cloud.
AuthService
An interface designed to define the basic methods of working with the database.
AuthServiceBD
A class that works with a user Database.
ChangeInterface
The interface works with the CallBack GUI.
ClientApp
The FX class of the application, Launches the UI of the application according to the description of the application scene described in view.xml file.
Connection
Class describing the network connection, openConnection().
Controller
The application controller class.
Controller
Additional Graphical interface for server management.
DelFileHandler
Class listener of messages carrying information about file deletion.
DelFileRequest
The successor class AbstractMessage, is a Data Transfer Object, carries the name of the file to be deleted from the cloud.
FileHandler
Class listener of messages carrying file data.
FileHandler
Class listener of messages carrying file data.
FileInfo
A model describing the properties of the file.
FileInfo.FileType
Type - file or directory.
FileMessage
The successor class AbstractMessage, is a Data Transfer Object, designed to transfer bytes of a file.
FileRequest
The successor class AbstractMessage, is a Data Transfer Object, is a service command that requests a file from the cloud.
FilesInformService
The class is intended as a service that returns in its methods: how much space the cloud is busy for a specific user, a list of the user's files.
FilesListRequestHandler
The message listener class, defines the response to the request (Files Size Request), about receiving the state of the Cloud for the user who sent the request.
FilesSizeRequest
The descendant class of AbstractMessage, is a Data Transfer Object.
FilesSizeRequestHandler
Message Listener class FilesSizeRequest.
FileWorker
The class responsible for sending files to the cloud.
Launcher
Launching the application.
Launcher
A class for launching the Server GUI.
Main
Class for starting the server.
Main
The FX class of the application, Launches the UI of the application according to the description of the application scene described in sample.xml file.
MainHandler
The main listener of the Netty pipeline, extends ChannelInboundHandlerAdapter, the method of reading channelRead channelRead is essentially the main point connecting the Netty kernel and the program with all its actions that will be taken to process received message.
MainHandler
The main listener of the Netty pipeline, extends ChannelInboundHandlerAdapter, the method of reading channelRead channelRead is essentially the main point connecting the Netty kernel and the program with all its actions that will be taken to process received message.
RegistryHandler
The message listener logger class.
RegistryHandler
The message listener logger class.
RegUserHandler
Message Listener class RegUserRequest.
RegUserHandler
Message Listener class RegUserRequest.
RegUserRequest
The descendant class of AbstractMessage, is a Data Transfer Object.
ReqFileHandler
File request message listener class.
RequestHandler
The functional interface used in HandlerRegistry to save methods and call them.
RequestHandler
The functional interface used in RegistryHandler to save methods and call them.
ServerApp
The class that starts the Netty Server.
